lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why's everyone laughing? So yes! We're going to hop in here, but before we do, we have some quick announcements to get through. First and foremost, we have a survey that we put up a couple of weeks ago. It ends April 18th. If you happen to have an opportunity, please go ahead and put in your information, let us know where you're from, how much of the show you've watched, what kind of future things from Critical Role you'd like to see. It's us getting a feel for the size and spread of the community and it's very helpful and awesome. So you can check that out at geekandsundry.com/crsurvey. You'll probably see the link in chat as well, please do that if you haven't yet, that'd be awesome! You have until April 18th. As far as merch goes, we're still out of stock on dice, I believe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's officially 30 sets left, according to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 30 sets?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 30 sets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There are 30 sets left in the store, we will be ordering more. So there will be more, but I don't know when that's, you know, going to come in. So 30 sets for the time being.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic. Thank you Laura. Yes. Taliesin! Wednesday Club coming up, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a Wednesday Club. We're doing Comics 101, it's going to be our intro to how to read comics! The notion is like the show that you would show your grandmother, or your friend who's never apparently seen a written word next to a picture before. They do exist! I'm sadly not going to be there, but Amy and Matt are going to throw together something really, really awesome, and I'm going to be helping out from the sidelines, throwing them stuff, because I'm going to be out of town. But yay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. Speaking of Taliesin and a different Matt, we're both going to be on Eric's TBD RPG tomorrow at noon Pacific time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. The dice are gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dice are gone.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Just now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done. Jesus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, guys that got them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll be returning as my character Meatstick, the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Meatstick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that'll be fun!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very fun, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know it is, and I believe Darin De Paul will be joining us as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he's a maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe? He's supposed to be. I think he might be a little late. I'll check in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pretty sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mystery! Abound! Marisha! New Signal Boost, went up this week?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! It's... me! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Full circle!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Again! I'm back! Go watch-- actually, we're going to be playing it over the course of the break. So that we have a break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You should watch it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you'll watch it over the course of the break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's only getting weirder, folks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got a lot of meta things going on, reflecting our day-to-day lives. It always has been. It's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a reminder: me, Taliesin, and Marisha will be guests at Momocon, May 25th to the 28th in Atlanta, Georgia! So if you're in that area, other side of the country, come say hi then! Because that'd be fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Talks Machina, of course, every Tuesday, at 7PM Pacific here on Twitch and Alpha, where we talk about-- next week, we'll be talking about this episode! And the episode before that a little bit, probably, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I hope everyone liked the panel, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The panel went great! We had a great turnout at WonderCon!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, thanks everybody who came!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was super cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like we kind of filled the arena. I had this big fear we were going to get up on stage and it was going to be, like, seven people in the front row and just empty space.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apparently 2,800.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 2,800 strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You Critters!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, so many Critters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So thanks for coming, guys!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Great costumes, lots of cosplay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Brian Wayne Foster also said the Wondercon panel will be on G&S's YouTube Friday at 8PM, in case you missed it on Talks Machina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great, so you can check it out then. And I believe, unless I'm mistaken, that's it. Anything else anyone wants to talk about? Noelle, anything you want to talk about?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I had a great day today--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: -- and it was really fun. I had a good lunch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so glad. What'd you have?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Falafel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice, good choice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey look, this is a book that she made, and it's so good! And she signed it for me and I'm reading it to my kids and they love it!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: There's a bear in it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There is a bear in it!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, by the way, thank you again, Noelle, for coming and playing this again this week.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you snuck into the home of this pit fiend, you quickly discovered a dwarvish female had endured quite some torture and was found chained to a table. You released her, and she introduced herself as Tova. Actually, I don't believe you ever introduced yourself. You didn't give a name? Did you?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It's in there somewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure it was somewhere in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, she said her name!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think you did. Okay, good. Little else, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wrote it down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. That means it happened!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. That was awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I also wrote down "chain devils know." I don't know what that note meant.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh my god, what do they know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You were tripping last session.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because the chain devil potentially knew--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: About the Bastion of Flesh, is that what it was?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was just, chain devils know, period.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Very broody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. What do you bring to me to pleasure?" And I need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god! That quickly, huh?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Telepathically?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, just like the last one spoke to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are people just too lazy to use their mouths?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mouths are for eating, not for talking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like texting in hell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah. All righty, folks. So, given that point. 25 to 20?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 to 15. Who has what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Samesies.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, we're going together. Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, we all did pretty well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah we did, for us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all between 15 and 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, as the pit fiend's still just standing there, its arm hanging over the edge of this giant axe it's using, propping it, it stares at Grog. It seems to be completely lazy, confident, and doesn't feel threatened whatsoever by the presence of this goliath that has stepped into its visual range. However, top of the round, Vax and Vex. What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clicking the Boots of Haste. I'm going to now-- I know that there's a clot of people, but I have a lot of movement now, so I'm going to slide back towards Grog? No, towards Tova. That's a big bear at the other entrance. Towards the other entrance. Oh, that's a wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's no other entrance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only entrance you know of is this one right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We really should have gone up and looked at it up close before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. Now you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'm going to slide along the wall up to where Grog is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You move along on this side?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Am I within range of oily guy? What's the distance, though, ten feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The distance between you and Utugash would be 25 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 25 feet. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little test run. Let's dagger, dagger, dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Because I don't know if he's really there or not. First one is 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, good. That's 12, plus eight, nine--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was just thinking because it's at the same time, technically our moves. Could I send Trinket in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket into the room? Or just into the hallway?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that way Trinket's next to him so that my brother gets better-- doesn't he get better--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket has a speed of 40, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think so, yeah. Could he get there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket can get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, that is so scary! I don't know, now that I'm saying it, if that's the way to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go with your instincts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's my question.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While he's figuring out his shit, if Trinket falls and I don't see him, does he still come into Raven's Slumber if it's within 100 feet? Or do I have to have visual?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Matthew Mercer!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, there is really one way to find out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then he's going to do that so that you have a better attack on him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm going first, so I've got the goods already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfuck. Whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush in, you get there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First blade goes, and I'm going to Smite him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you waiting for Trinket to get there before you throw?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm not. I went already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go for your attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But you could, he's saying you could have your advantage on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have it because I'm going before. Because I'm smiting him, first hit's for 55 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 55 points of damage. Slick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the third is a 27 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All three hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The next one, I will try--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: What could possibly go wrong?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just keep saying that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So he has to save against a DC 15 for poison on the second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it doesn't. He's immune.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I figured I'd try. The next is nine, plus psychic damage, damn it, 12. So a total of 14, just for those two attacks. And then I will use some more movement to move past Grog, still in the hole, pressed against the outside of the door, out of his sight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're now hiding against this side of the wall there. As Trinket runs in into the center of the area, as Trinket rushes in and rushes up to the side of the pit fiend, what are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to back up next to Tova. Wait, who's the big guy? What's that big thing? Is that Doty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's Doty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to have Trinket attack him, since I don't have visual on him right now, as my bonus move. So he's just going to get one attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, let me check one thing real fast on beastmaster. You are technically taking the attack action yourself. I'll allow it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said I can get my attacks and then have Trinket be my bonus action, because he can do one attack as my bonus action. Single attack on bonus for bestial fury.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. He's going to just be in there, roaring. Get them, Trink! He's going to roll a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! Whoa! That's a 15!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. Are Trinket's attacks magical?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he's a really magically charismatic masseuse--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Trinket gets an attack, scrapes the claw, gets up there as it runs into the room, the claw strikes, slashes across the front of the belly of the giant red pit fiend. It doesn't do as much damage as you hoped it would.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it do any damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're holding your action until you have visual on the pit fiend. Taryon, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's rather stuffy in here, so we should open a window. I'll run up to right in front of Vex and slap a window on the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Did you run out of doors?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I came with one. But I have two windows!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So for the purposes of this, this is now a window here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it have nice Roman-style shade and then little baskets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no. It's beautifully carved. Yeah, it was like some Italian architects designed this beautiful--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a casement window, so I have to go-- (squeaking) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. So, to Taryon. Use your action to rush forward, you rip off the patch, slam the patch on the side, and you watch as the stone suddenly crumbles to dust in that space. Window is now open in the side of that wall. As soon as that happens--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, go make your attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two against the pit fiend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two against-- I want to do Bramble Shot as my first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh! 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 hits! Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So I get Sneak Attack because Trinket's next to him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 4d8. Seven plus ten is 17. 17 just for that brambleness. And then he has to roll a strength saving throw of DC 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's cocked. Yeah, rolled a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 15. 17 plus three is 20. Three lightning damage of that and then Sneak Attack is another six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's the first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Second attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Second attack! What was that? 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right! What's five plus eight? Is that 13?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Notoriously bad at math.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Moneybags, what the hell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15 with two lightning damage. 16, 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So both arrows fire off. You watch as the one slams into the side of Utugash and the vines wrap around. Utugash brings one arm up, tears them off of his body, picks up the axe and hefts it over the shoulder looking back at where the window now exists where once there was none. Looks over and sees you and Taryon through the window.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I allowed to move back at all, or duck under the window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move on inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I probably can't hide; isn't that a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you already used bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if I just move out of the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, you can move out of the way if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way or this way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Towards Doty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards Doty? Okay, so you're going to move on the other side of Doty. That's going to be your movement, there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Cool. That is going to bring us to Taryon. Did you want to do anything with Doty?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How big's the window in size?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's two feet by four feet, I believe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He could pull through, but it's going to take half his movement to do so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just say, Doty! Go back up Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Doty runs this way. Five, ten, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35. Doty gets right there, just crammed through the hallway and squeezed through. And that's going to be where Doty stays. All right, that ends your turn. All right, at this point now, Utugash puts one hand up and gives some sort of a marker in the air. You're not quite sure what the meaning is or what it's doing. You're the only one who really sees it, Taryon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't see it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you see it too, Grog, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I totally know he was (sings) dancing, dancing, dancing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have any idea?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't, actually. He just goes like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Semaphore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's it. All right, Keyleth. Then Tova and Grog, you're on deck, so--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to scooch Vex over, be like, sorry, excuse me! I just want to-- And into the window? And I want to do--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not next to the window anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon is. You moosh past Taryon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sorry. Excuse me, Tary. Blight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Blight? Okay.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Blight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Range on Blight is 60 feet, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 feet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I within 30 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to have to get closer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Each one of those squares in the room with him are ten feet squares, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each square is five feet. It's five, ten, 15--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The big squares are ten, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the big squares are ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's hard to see the smaller ones.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you'd have go through the window to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Come to my window!

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: (sing) Come inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sure, I'll go through the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you step through, you get about there. You have ten feet more movement. So that'll do it. All right, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I Blight and then back out? Back through the window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll get up into the window. You won't get all the way through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (grunts) Shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 21. What's your DC?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! Are you serious? 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so takes half damage. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, he took damage, though!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only half damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because he's immune to magic or something? Is that what's going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have advantage on saving throws against spells. You figured this information when you researched.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And only magical weapons can damage them, or they have resist on non-magical weapons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They seem to have resistance from non-magical weapons, from the research you've done, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Based on my lack of Trinket attack fullness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 32 total? And yeah, am I able to like barrel roll, like through the window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get up partway through the window, and that's the extent of where you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on! Wait! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'd like to think one of your antlers caught, and you're like, (yelps).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not like this! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Tova. Grog.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh boy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bears first.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay, so how far would I have to run to get into the front door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get over here?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be 30. 35 feet would get you right at the front door, there.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So if I drag Keyleth out of the window, could I go through the window? Am I too big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could go through the window. You'd lose about ten feet of your movement, but you'd be able to get through it. You'd probably push her out of it.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I push her. Can I pull her? (laughs) I have to push her back in and then go through?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm like the golden retriever with the stick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you carry her through, that's going to use part of your actions this turn. Or you could just barrel through and push her out. What're you going to do?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right, so, I can go 45 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So if I just bear-barrel through, how close could I get to this guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get right up next to him.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right, I'm going to do that. I'm going to go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush over and go right past, now bear and bear, side by side. Keyleth, you get knocked out of the window, prone. All of a sudden this giant werebear (impact noise) just shoulder checks you and you go flying out, landing on your face, on the heated stone. (sizzling noise) Ah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! It's okay.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine, I needed a tan! I was getting a little pasty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: God! I would feel worse if your shopping trip hadn't gotten me so much more tortured yesterday than it should have. I don't feel that bad. I'm going to be honest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You legit shouldn't.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So now I'm in, is there any way I could get on the other side of him from Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no. Your full movement gets you right up next to the pit fiend.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Damn. This is a bad plan. All right. Well, I'm just going to hit him with my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a bonus action, too.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Are my claws only magical when I'm doing the thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your claws are magical in general.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm just going to hit him with my claws, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take the sword and chuck it aside for a second, and bring out your bear claws and you're going to go for a double strike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 19 to hit?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 misses, unfortunately.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Goddamn it. And 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 does. The first strike goes (scraping sound), scrapes across the front of the belly of the pit fiend. No damage sustained, chuckles deeply. You back up with another strike.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right. So that's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 damage?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, I guess so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. And you can use your bonus action to attack a third time if you want to.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to use my bonus action to cast Curse of Mutual Suffering. And I'm going to amplify that. So I'm going to-- wait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What're these words?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm super special. It's about to get extra in here. So if I do a blood curse and I take damage, does that mean that my werewolf state gets agitated? If it's self-inflicted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it's self-inflicted, no.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So that means I take 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So go ahead and roll your Crimson Rite die, which I think is a d8. So you just roll a d8 and you take that much damage.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh. Right. I thought that it was my other one, so that's fine. That's great. I took one point of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. So you take one point of damage, and, as far as the Mutual Suffering-- All right, there you go. So. You watch as you rush up to it, you slash it twice with your claws, and as you pick up your sword, you put one hand up, and as you close your fist, you watch as blood pools in the center of your palm and drips out the corners of your fingers. As it does, you watch the veins on the outside of Utugash's stomach pulse for a second, and his chuckle goes (groans), like he got a tummy ache. All right, that ends your turn.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Told you I was going to going to be extra.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that finishes Tova turn. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: May I run up to his opposite side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just where his right arm is. Just so he's got escorts on each end. May I smash together my Titanstone Knuckles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like the Autobots.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it was good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) You got the touch--

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: (sings) You got the power!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You transform into your larger self.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's up, bitch? May I make two reckless attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. That's a 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19. Nice. That is 36.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that can't be. 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33. Damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I did the second hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Go ahead and roll damage for each.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18 for the first one. These are two-handed, by the way. 22 for the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! So 40 points of damage on the two strikes. As you rush up, almost diving into the pool, you skirt off to the side, slam the Titanstone Gauntlets together and grow to your larger size. Swirling the axe in the air, you go (whoosh), and the second strike in a big X formation across the side of it. You see it gashing across the arm and the upper muscles of the shoulder, and you see his fingers grip the axe with more anger and frustration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, and this is the Thrower. It's still the Dwarven Thrower, though, the hammer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, right, the hammer, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to go into a frenzied rage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks. And I don't get to attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What color is pit fiend blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a dark, dark blackish-purple. All righty, that ends Grog and Tova's turn. Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's looking really crowded over there. I'm going to wander over to that first prison cell and take a look inside that door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Percival!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percival. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm standing in the corner looking at him like, (whispers) what are you fucking doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, a lot. 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance inside, and you can see what appear to be piles of goods: small chests, boxes, crates. It looks like various things that have been collected and just shoved in this corner and locked up. There is a lock on this door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. How's my visual on that guy through the window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I ignore anything other than full cover. I ignore three-quarter cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you have visual.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm going to take my first shot at that lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have a bonus action, we'll say, because you moved up and just glanced inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take my first shot with the Pepperbox at that lock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The lock? Okay, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27? Okay, go ahead and roll damage on the lock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously it doesn't take psychic damage. That's 16 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of damage? The lock blasts off, and leaves hanging a small piece of twisted, turned metal that once was the top of it. The door is now unlocked and open.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool. I'm going to turn and take my last two shots at Orthax. I've got a plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Utugash.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've just given the game away!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yelling out the wrong name in bed, eh? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you having PTSD flashbacks, Percival? Are you okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man! I'm too tired. I'm going to mess up my plan! This is so bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm totally into you, (stammering) Utugash.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First shot, I'm going to take the Animus, and I'm going to try for a trick shot, for an arm shot. One for Grit, and just for safety's sake-- no, that's all. That's a 31 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's ten, plus eight, plus 1d6 psychic. Plus I'm going to burn eight points of Cabal's Ruin, which empties Cabal's Ruin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's going to be 14 points of damage, plus one point of psychic damage, plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 8d6 lightning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shnikes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cabal's Ruin, man. Vestiges (singsong) at your disposal!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Five, six. Yeah, I'll take a seven and an eight, I'll give these back to you. (continues counting) 23 points, does that seem right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 points, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 23 points of lightning damage. And also he has to do a strength check or drop the axe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 29.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He makes that strength check! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He had a natural 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And, just for fun, I'll take one more shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 31 to hit, that hits. Nothing fancy on this one, obviously, just the old-fashioned-- 16 points of damage plus one point of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then I'm going to use the rest of my turn to, if possible, open that door and get behind it for cover, of that room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, because you blew the lock off and the door's somewhat ajar, we'll say you move it open and get partially inside, that's as far as you can get.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just want to use it for cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn, Utugash is going to use a legendary action to attack you.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Bring it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ursa Major.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That's my wrestling name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 16 to hit. I think that hits you because you have no armor on.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It hits. Yeah, I don't have no armor on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as the giant axe swings towards you, that's going to be 23 points of slashing damage with the axe. However, that does trigger the Mutual Suffering, so he takes 23 points of necrotic damage from the impact. As the axe swings and cuts across your bear chest, all of sudden, where the blood bulged earlier, you watch a secondary wound open simultaneously where no weapon was apparently visible and blood begins to just trickle out. Devil blood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Teach me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That. Was. Sick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he's going to use, as part of his last legendary action, and does another maneuver with his finger like that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He did another thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did another gesture? What gesture? What did he do?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, fuck!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gang sign, gang sign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, people are watching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was it this thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, at the top of the round-- The only people in the room right now, Keyleth is face-first on the ground. I need Tova and Grog to make perception checks, if you could.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Trinket? Trinket's got a really good sense of smell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have Trinket roll a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 plus-- what does he add to it? Anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever his perception bonus is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wow! 17 plus nine. 26!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket doesn't know why, but he's like (sniffs). And you watch Trinket looking around the room. The pit fiend is not alone. You don't know where anything else is, but while the room appears to be empty, Trinket is picking up other scents in the room.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I talk to Trinket? Can I understand Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why not? Your bear form, you speak bear

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Ah, I love this!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody buckle up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sniffs) "Two! Small."

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: There's two! Small!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why do you sound like a bear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the sound of grinding stone. You don't see anything. Unfortunately, the low light in here, and your not great perception, you don't pick out any visual, other than-- a familiar sound to you, Grog-- as something in the ceiling opens up, and suddenly searing hot oil comes spilling from the ceiling, down onto both you, Trinket, and Tova. I need you to make dexterity saves, Tova, Trinket, and Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't fuck me Gil. Oh, Gil. Did he get an advantage, though, because he sniffed out people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should've gone with Gil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that is 21 points of fire damage to Trinket, Tova, and Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he take 21 points of fire damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am resistant to fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Devils have a strange thing called immunity to fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Immunity? Not just resistance, immunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're devils, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I'm resistant to fire, but this is boiling oil, does that count?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its claws come through. It's as wide as the hallway, its jaw unhinges, its tongue slathering, these small flapping insect-like wings across the back of its scapula, its claws reach out towards you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The rest of the party hears: ermagerd, ermagerd, ermagerd!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you already ask if the pit fiend took damage because you took damage?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, did he take damage from me? Was my curse still in effect?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just for one hit.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Sorry. I tried my best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, he's going to take three attacks on you. That is a 27.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that kind of hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that is a 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with the tail, that is a 24.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That also hits. I will use Uncanny Dodge for the tail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So the first claw hits you, you take 11 points of slashing damage, and as the first claw strikes you across the chest, the second one, you manage to duck right out of the way, it slams into the stonework, and as you glance up, you try and dodge and roll out of the way as the tail scrapes you across the back. That is 18 points of piercing damage, reduced to six, and you would have the possibility of becoming poisoned; however, you guys are still under the effect of Heroes' Feast, so that does not affect you.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So his tail's poisoned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it is Utugash's turn.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh my god, that wasn't even his turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was the turn, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Utugash stands here with the axe and goes, the mouth not moving, you just hear the voice echoing between your ears. It's sourceless and in your face, "Now that we're all gathered around--" There's a flash of red in the eyes and suddenly the ground circling him erupts into flames. A wall of fire is now currently circling the vicinity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This entire column of 20 foot tall flames encircle him and bursts up, singeing Grog, Trinket, and Tova.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just singeing.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Seemed like such a good idea!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How high is the ceiling in that room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 25 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So there's a little space up top?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can see through the fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't see through the fire, the fire completely obscures your visual of him. All you see is flames, and you see the vague shadows of Tova, Grog, and Trinket, now currently engulfed in them. I need you guys to all roll dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: God, son of a bitch. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, everyone but Trinket failed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, a 15 and 12 don't make it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 points of fire damage to Grog and Tova.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Resistant, so I got halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no vision for Percy. Any ranged attacks, you cannot see the creature. Utugash sits there in the flames surrounding him, seemingly not interested in moving at the moment, enjoying the current position.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are we going to get him out of those flames, man?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tary, you got some kind of Dispel Magic over there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am so weak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you have spells? You have so many spells!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys want a window somewhere?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Could you put a window through him? And that would kill him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's real strong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to use my bonus action to cast Vow of Enmity on the bone devil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, Vow of Enmity is in play.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'm going to use one of my two actions, I'm using an action to Disengage from the bone devil and dance back past Doty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dance back past Doty? All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then I'm going to chuck a goddamn Vestige at this motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the bone devil?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At advantage. Oh, I rolled the same thing on both. 24 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so, he's going to get it. Right, here we go. Two plus eight is ten, plus--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How tall is the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 25 feet tall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So there's a little window on top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little four or five foot gap, very small.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I already like it. This is a beautiful glimmer in your eye. I'm excited.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's something, isn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 38, and I will Smite him as well. 52.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 52 points of damage. Nice. As you throw the dagger, as the creature watches you dart past, it streaks out to try and strike at you, but you're already gone. As you turn around, you throw the dagger. It strikes right into the chest of the bone devil, as it bursts with this dark grayish-white light indicative of the Raven Queen's direct impact. As it bursts, you watch as part of the flesh tears open, showing the dark bluish purple sinew and muscle beneath, and the devil just (growls).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get out of that hallway!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it, I'm done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. So I'm going to come up in front of the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You glance in and you just see fire and the butt of Trinket sticking out of the fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And my feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, just up in the air, kicking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I Hunter's Mark the pit fiend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't see it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's fine. I know where he was, right? Trinket is facing him, so can I try to shoot him with an arrow, anyway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have Sharpshooter, I don't know if that helps at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's completely covered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, let's try this out. Those are being aggressive. The lower of the two rolls was 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The actual shaft burns as it impacts in the flames.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You should've used your fire-proof arrows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. If I shot an arrow from a Blazing Bowstring so it was already a fire arrow, you think it would go through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Give it a shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, second attack, Blazing Bowstring, go ahead and roll with disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. You go ahead and fire. It isn't consumed by the flames, but the arrow you hear exit the other side and then ricochet off the far wall and miss the creature's target.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket is going to use his bonus action to try to attack him, even though he's not magical and he's a little piece of shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 does hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, go Trinket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Trink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's good, too! That's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. Halve that to seven, seven points of slashing damage across. Through the fire, still bravely fighting into it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. And I'm going to tell Trinket, back the fuck out of the fire, Trinket!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a good plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you doing? Stop attacking! Get out of the fire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Backs up and gets out of the flames, backing up against the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. And then I'm going to back away from the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to back away from the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you want Trinket to land, by the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just into the corner, like where the angle of the wall is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to back away from the window to where he doesn't have visual on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You back out of the way of the window, over here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As Trinket backs into that corner, I need Trinket to go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Come on, Trinket, come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Trink!

lines.name: TRAVIS, NOELLE, LAURA
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A giant cage falls from the ceiling of heated metal and lands on him, filled with spikes and (sad bear noises). You hear Trinket yell from the other side. Trinket takes seven points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did that to an animal!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't fuck with a ranger's bear!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And six points of fire damage from the heated metal, and Trinket is currently restrained, has to try and break free to get out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're evil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, Utugash is evil. There is a definite distinction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mr. Mercer, we pulled you over for speeding tonight. (different voice) No, I wasn't speeding tonight. The pit fiend was speeding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's important, guys. All righty, so. That ends your turn, Vex. Taryon, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fix everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make it better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm nobody! Is it just a cage or is there a door on the bear cage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like there is no visible door, you'd have to tear it off of him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not going to happen. Okay, our last fight, I had hasted myself. That was more than a minute ago, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it's about halfway done. This has all happened pretty quickly, because as soon as the battle started with the cambion that you guys chased out, every round thereafter, it's still going. So you still have five more rounds of Haste.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, well then, I'll go into the place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you jump over the window. Keyleth breaks your fall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Sorry! It's hard to see with my helmet! No peripheral vision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Occasionally, you see a wing tip carve through the top as the creature is moving within the wall of fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (laughs) Do you have a fire extinguisher?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! I don't have anything! How far can I move, hasted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double your movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just double your movement. Okay. So my movement's 30, so I can move in there with him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wanted to, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm just going to go, (yells) and run into the fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush into the flames. I need you to roll a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Advantage on dexterity saves. Oh. All right, no. That's nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Halved because of?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My Helm of Brilliance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. There you go. So 15 points of fire damage to you, Taryon. As you rush through, you're like, "Hah!" The fire was enough, and you sit there and look right up on this massive, like, swollen devilish entity with giant red leathery wings, lower jaw with hooked tusks that stick out the bottom, gleaming yellow piercing eyes, giant horns that curl up from the brow, a giant axe in one hand and the other hand just points at you and goes, "Hi." in the center of your head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and make the attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what I'm rolling. 14. This is to hit? It's magic? I don't know, how does this work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no-- hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a vial of acid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to pull up your class here, just to check it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I never know if this is a spell attack bonus sort of a thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you throw it, they have to make a saving throw. So what's your DC?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The DC of the spell is 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it's the acid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like how the music stopped while we figure this out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's dexterity. Okay. That is 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So he resists it completely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Creature must succeed or take-- yeah, he resists it entirely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Balls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you throw it, it hits the edge of the horn and just shatters and breaks behind it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. All right. I think I get a bonus still, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have a bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will cast Sanctuary on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you do is you have an extra attack-- as Haste you get your action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that was my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was your action. You have another action to do a melee attack if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, okay. I will stab him with my lance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. Roll for an attack. So yeah, as hasted, you get the additional attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's going to hit. It's a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, actually. Go ahead and roll the damage. And it is a magical weapon, so he's not resistant to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What sound do you make when you hit him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a breathy (grunts).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Work on your war face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 1d12. Thank you very much. That's seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you add anything to it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No wait, I get a plus six. Ooh, and it was a six! That's 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that fire damage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, the fire damage is another plus one, but I don't think you'll be adding that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah, so 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of damage against the pit fiend as you stab it and you can cast Sanctuary on yourself as your bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will, and as I do that I also say, Doty-- remember how I said back up Grog? Me! Back up me! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Doty charges forward and rushes in. I need Doty to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. 16 plus-- what's his dexterity?-- zero, so 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty takes 30 points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groans) He's unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Already?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know when the last time we rested was but I have down that he only has 30 hit points left. Did he take damage at some point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sizzling noise)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no! Is he going to melt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's in the fire, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's in the fire, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god. Is he making some sort of window that someone else could walk over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the flames curl around, sorry. All right, so that ends Taryon's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Killed my best friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary, it's your only friend!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check again, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Tova, both you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tova fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, okay. Still not quite noticing anything, but you're starting to notice that there are these small, inset stone circles on the wall behind him, over in this area. And you watch as two of them go (stone grinding) and get pressed in by themselves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Into the wall, or out from the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into the wall. Like something just pressed this giant, circular stone button-- separately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're in an engine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Vax, where you are, the floor, you hear a (click), like something releasing. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh well, I'm good. I'm fine, I'm at advantage. Hopefully that's good. Not that good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. Can you use Luck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, hold on. This is dexterity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It might be balloon animals, don't sweat it yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man, it's not great. It's 16.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Use Luck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I have one left? I think I have one left. So I'm going to use it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's better. That is 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 is enough. The ground suddenly hinges out from under you, and you leap up and jam your blades into each side of the wall and put your foot out to the side, and it's almost not enough to press into the small space, but you just barely catch yourself, Van Damme-style, on each side. The bone demon across from you, its wings flare up as the ground tumbles out from under you. You see about ten feet below you a pool of molten iron that is just (burbling). It stays open, swinging for a few seconds, before it closes once more beneath you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm really glad you used that Luck!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you know it's not molten steel? Kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One way to find out. That brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, jeez! Okay. I roll over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stand up and see Trinket currently trapped in the cage next to you just whining (sad bear whimpers).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay, buddy! Just hang on. Tsunami coming though, look out! I'm going to do a Tidal Wave and go (bwoosh). Do you have the laser pointer? What are these red pools of things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's molten blood, he said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's molten blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're doing Tidal Wave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to try and avoid my friends. It's ten-foot-wide.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you've got to, you know who to aim it at.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In fact, there's a ten-foot gap, right, Matt? Between everybody? Right up front?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right up front there's a little bit of a gap there, and Doty is on the ground, you can step on Doty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's ten foot, right? Can I do my Tidal Wave from this direction backwards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How wide is the Tidal Wave?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still going to hit somebody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's it going to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's five feet between Taryon and Tova, and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Either me or Taryon. I mean, Doty. Or whoever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know Grog is dextrous, so Grog can take it. Sorry, Grog. But I want to start here and go backwards. Towards you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Towards me? So this way. Okay. You're choosing Taryon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, Grog, to get hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, this way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It's a ten-foot-wide column that I just want to go back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. In order for it to hit the pit fiend? It's going to hit either Taryon--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because Grog's far off to the side-- If it comes back this way, it's just going to hit Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I was confused, when you said Grog. So who's it going to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to hit either Taryon, or it's going to have to hit Tova and Doty.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Do what you've got to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tova.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need Tova to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only because I think she's more dextrous than him.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, Utugash does not make the save either! With a roll of a six plus eight, that is a 14. So, that's 4d8 bludgeoning damage, go ahead and roll that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh man. Kill our own guest?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's not that much. Five, six, seven-- Ten, and a reroll, I do an eight! So that's eight-- 23 damage, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he should be knocked prone--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not a seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's an eight. Wait, five, seven, that's 10, 18. 18 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he's knocked prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As is Tova.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then the water spreads across the ground in all directions, and extinguishes unprotected flames in an area within 30 feet of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's all I cared about, mainly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is knocked prone, he took damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I tried. Sorry, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to move, or are you going to stay where you are, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to back up as-- Can I crawl? Do I have enough movement to crawl back through the window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go back there, and you can move right back, around--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to keep it, use it as like cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That ends Keyleth's turn. Tova. Grog.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Took some damage. Little bit. But I'm prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can get up and use half your movement.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay, I've got to make a wisdom saving throw to not attack anyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you under half health?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yes, I am. Oh! I actually did it! Okay, it's fine, don't worry! False alarm, everything's fine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you maintain control.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Don't worry about it! We'll deal with it later when it comes up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What would've happened to me?!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: No, everything's fine! We're good! So, if I stand up, that takes half my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half your movement.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay. Well, I'm going to stand up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still in the flames, currently.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Well, that's not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can take your turn and then back out of the flames, if you wanted to.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm going to use my Crimson Rite to light up my claws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With what type of--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: With frozen. Does that help me with fire at all? Can I bat the flames away with my icy paws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your hands feel more comfortable.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where once was these giant bear claws, you watch as mystic ice gathers around them, turning into longer razors that extend from your regular claws.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right; I'm going to come to this guy, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eat it, Utugash!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: My claw attacks with the Rite, does that increase--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not to hit, but it does an additional 1d8 cold damage per strike.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right. That's a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you get advantage because he's prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get advantage because he's prone--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The third attack, if you want to use your bonus-- You already used your bonus, you only get two. Both hit! Roll damage.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right. That is a 13. And that's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add 2d8 cold damage to that as well, because of your Crimson Rite.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: 2d8. Can I use my Great Weapon to reroll my one, here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is a four and a five. So, nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to back out of the flames?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, that'd be good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get that far out of the way. You back up just out of the fire. Look over, and there's another bear chained in that place. That ends your turn. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I advance through the ring of fire and on him more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, because of both of your sizes, you cannot advance into the ring. He takes up too much space. You're either standing right in the middle of the ring and just taking it, or you're going to have to back out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you jump on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try, if you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could jump on him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because at the worst I just fall off one side or the other into the boiling blood-- I'll just stay in the ring of fire. I don't want to test the Sriracha pit just yet. Because he's prone, do I get advantage on the attacks without having to use Reckless?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make all three of my frenzied attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With advantage. 35 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is ten, 20. 26?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. That's 29?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: C'mon, 37.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh, all righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 22 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of damage, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my Action Surge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you take something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Second level in Fighter. Groggy got two more hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's five attacks in one round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can only do it one time. That's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 25 points of damage. And that's 29. Hits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (high-pitched) Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much damage did he just do with one turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did over a hundred.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I'm cooking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're staying where you are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they're really strong hits because I'm burning while I'm doing it. Literally whaling through the fire and just angry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make your dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Advantage on that. That sucks, that's a seven. I have resistance to fire, it's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 points of fire damage. Reduced to half, 14.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 14, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends Grog's turn. Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If he's prone, does that mean that negates the difficulty to hit through the ring?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, ranged attacks against prone creatures have disadvantage, naturally, and you can't even see him, you have no visual range. You don't even know that he's prone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's a mess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I still have my movement, can I move out of the ring?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was asking if you wanted to do that or not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I would like to, after all the smashing is done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move out and do not take the last bit of fire damage. You take that when you end your turn in the fire. How far do you back up? Just out of the range?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just on the cusp of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not to the other corner where there's probably--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I think I can see that Vax is having a little bit of a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can glance to the side, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a window in the door. I'm going to swing around the other side of that door really quickly. Perch on the wall right over there and I'm going to take a couple shots at Mr. Skelly Skellington.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not just in the closet over there sorting through file cabinets?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter) I was hoping we would find a person in there, I'll keep digging. Okay so first shot I'm going to burn a Grit for a torso push.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I'm going to add Hex to that, just for fun. I'm going to Hex him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And he's pushed ten feet back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slams) up against the wall there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to shoot him two more times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the portcullis closed behind you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The portcullis is currently closed. As soon as he pushed through it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Second shot, I'm going to burn one more Grit and I'm going to try for a head shot. Which will give him disadvantage on next round's attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 24 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 11 points of normal damage, five points of psychic damage and two points of necrotic-- piercing damage. He has to save against a constitution saving throw. Against 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 16.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has disadvantage on all of his physical attacks for the next round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One more shot for fun and let's make this a sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was not my wisest thing ever. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 does not hit, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is unsettling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to flip back around on the other side of that. I'm going to spider crawl all the way on the other side of that door again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn. At the end of Percival's turn, there is a grinding sound above. Grog, I need you to make another dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Gil. 18.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it big enough to cover his big body?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just like a spiked helmet stabbing me in the cheek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It tears into you. You take 14 points of piercing damage reduced to seven, and then six points of fire damage reduced to three. You are restrained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This one has spikes on the inside too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it's hot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's hot. (sizzles) as the piercing and the fire damage hits you. You are restrained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (warbled scream) Is that how you sound, Tary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bone devil's going to fly across and it's actually going to fly over Vax and land on the opposite side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did it go past me? Can I get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, it flies up high enough to be out of your range and then drops down, both claws arcing towards you with disadvantage. First one's going to be 22.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's your AC?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hasted, with both daggers out? It's 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the tail, it is 19. All three miss.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why does he have disadvantage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I shot him in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, one of the eyes got blasted on the side. Part of the skull is broken and destroyed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That happens when I breathe for a second before I shoot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, he's pulling things out!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: More miniatures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two more devil characters come through. The portcullis rises as they pass through, and they go into a full run into this chamber. You see these red-skinned devil humanoids rush in with these long jagged spears. Horned crests on their head, and from where their chins are, there are these writhing tentacles covered in thorns and barbs that move and twist around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What sweet hell did your imagination come from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as they can get. Not fully up to anybody yet. All right, we have Utugash. Stands up in the flames and looks down at Taryon Darrington.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good day to you, sir. Do you know my father?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the voice echo in the center of your mind, "Good day, and good night!" It's going to make a full round of attacks on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that is 30 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, of course. Doty will save-- Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 16 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I'm hasted, that does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rolled a two to hit. You just manage to duck out of the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Haha!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say, 'Haha!' the axe comes from the other side-- That is a 22 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have ve-- Ah! Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double nines. That is 28 points of slashing damage. The flames that currently engulf the axe-- The axe has burst into flames. He swings with it, deals an additional 16 points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Halved.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many ds of what did you roll?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh! No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And using the momentum of the axe, the entire body of the pit fiend spins around the tail, whipping towards you. That is 20 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? But I'm just a man! Yeah, of course that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the tail swings past, that is 28 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you alive, Tary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm okay because Marisha reminded me that when I was not here one week, she gave me an extra 17 hit points, which I still have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Inspiring Leader feat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're helping me a lot right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Utugash stays there in the center of the flames, just waiting for people to come to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He still looks nonplussed? Just chill?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know, you can't see through the fire. That brings us to the top. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to shoot out my fucking wings and I'm going to Hunter's Mark the asshole, and then I'm going to skip--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guy you're fighting?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to skip Disengage and fly backward towards the end of the hall he came out of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the first of those attacks, I have Sanctuary.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just one wisdom roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20, plus ten, 30.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's safe to say, even in retrospect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sorry. Time progressed as it was meant to. But good call! So, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was wings, Hunter's Mark, chancing a hit as I fly down the hall away from him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It attacks with the tail. Still has disadvantage. 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just arcs and misses you as you zoom out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to chuck Whisper using a sharpshooter, but at advantage. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. 11, 21 plus psychic damage, sorry, doing math, be right with you. 58.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 58, nice! That was towards the bone devil?

lines.name: LIAM
