lines.text: Throwing the dagger? Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. That was with the Sneak Attack damage, because--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I'm at advantage because of Vow of Enmity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vow of Enmity was on the pit fiend.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it was on the bone devil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right, it was. You're correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also Hunter's Mark. So let's up that by one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Cool. That's your single attack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I used everything. Wings, Hunter's Mark, and the dagger. Bonus, action, action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I pop through the window, will I be able to get out of the window? I want to pop through the window, get Trinket in the locket; that's what I'm going to do first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come through, step through--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go, Buddy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do, Trinket zooms into the locket, leaving the cage to clank to the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hop back through the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I let him back out of the locket from there, or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next turn, you can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my whole fucking turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yup! Tary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened? Oh, it's my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys would all be taking Fear Aura checks, but you're immune to fear because of your Heroes' Feast. Just letting you know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fear Aura checks? Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know how sometimes when we're in fights and bad guys can walk around us without incurring damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You only get attacks of opportunity if you move away. If you stay within range, it doesn't--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to clock around him, clockwise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Until--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, right there's pretty good. Do I see any-- I can't see out of the ring, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are stepping into the flames to do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ew, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get right here on the edge and not be quite in the fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a three. Can I feel really Lucky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, it does not work that way, Taryon. I am so sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's fine. Does it fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does fire, and I believe it's just a miss. It's a hit-or-miss-type circumstance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It just misses. I've lost it all there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ram head goes careening out of the wall of fire, slamming into the stone work and causing a big crack in the stone in the wall. The pit fiend says, "I will eat your face first."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh Jesus, I like my face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still hasted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still hasted. For my second thing, I can only do a melee attack. I can't cast anything, I can't reach into my satchel or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bonus action you have from Haste is for weapon attack only. Or you can try and run away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he'll get an attack of opportunity on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What would Doty do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fall over and be unconscious, is what Doty would do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Taryon's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I don't look, he'll go away!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Keyleth's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are the little pissant guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one there right next to Grog, and one right next to Doty. So there, and there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to hop through the window again. I'm going to cast Sunbeam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you gonna move in to try and get them both in the same path?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sunbeam it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt, can I use my bonus action to at least Hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, roll a stealth check. So it's a constitution saving throw for both of the bearded devils.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. That is a ten--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Negative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- and an 18.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Negative again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, 6d8 radiant damage to both and they are both blinded.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 6d8? Can I have two more d8s, please? Those were definitely d6s.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry, here's a d8.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. Oh that's good. 30 points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To both of them. Nice. As the beam (pssh) across the room it streaks down the way and both of them get engulfed. As the beam of bright sunlight energy slowly diminishes, their faces are seared. You see smoke pouring out of their eyes as they're both reaching up to the sockets. That was not so good for them. They're both looking pretty rough already.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Tary. Tary is within 30 feet of me, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see Tary. You just see a column of fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't see Tary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tary is currently inside the wall of fire, curled in a ball. All you see is a giant column of flame in the center of the room. And half of Doty being slowly heated up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see anyone else, and does anyone else look rough?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Grog with a giant cage on his upper body, wrapping around his torso.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm down to 39 hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see Tova?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see Tova, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, nine hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fixed.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All better now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, it helps. It all helps. Trust me, it helps. All right, Keyleth, are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Keyleth stays there. Tova and Grog, you're up.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So two questions and one of them is, is my Rite still on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes it is. Your Rite stays on until you dismiss it.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right, my question also is are these cages still-- would it hurt me to touch one or move one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, they're pretty warm to touch.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: My hands are very cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? Actually, with your claws out, I would say they will do no damage to you because the cold will offset that.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right, so let me know if this sounds doable. I want to grab that cage that Trinket was under.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: And move it towards where Utugash is. Tary is in the fire, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I grab him and pull him back with me, behind this cage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to step into the fire, take the fire damage, grab him and pull him back.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I just reach (laughs) my cold bear hand into the fire and grab him and pull him out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll still take the fire damage from the wall of fire, unfortunately.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I get decreased fire damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are closer to the cage than you are him. So if you want to grab the cage and move towards him you can do that. Is that what you want to do?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Let me-- can I grab this cage and put it between-- this cage is just sitting out, got to do something. Can I throw the cage at that guy who's standing there? He's there, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage because you are in your bear form.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (laughs) That is a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 is fine, that's enough.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: No, wait. 13. What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't you roll an eight?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus your strength of ten. So 18.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh yeah. Bears are great at math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, this would be an athletics check to lift it, not strength, sorry.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay, then yeah. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll? Oh no. You throw the cage and it rolls into the center of the hallway there, blocking the doorway. Ah, those ones are the worst.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) That dice sucks.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I know, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You seriously need to stop using that one.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: What else can I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have your movement and your bonus if you wanted to do--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have healing potions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have your Blood Maladict if you wanted to use any of it.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, I was sort of unprepared for this. I was really excited for this fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tiny pockets, this is a problem of women's fashion, to be fair.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I know, even with the bears.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why tiny pockets?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on women's fashion, come on.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So I have my bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is a Blood Maladict?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Really cool words on the sheet.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I know. Not as helpful as I had hoped. I can see an object's history--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, what are you doing? While she is figuring this out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to try and get out of the cage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and make a strength skill check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have advantage on those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (Grog voice) I have advantage. Ooh, that's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: That's better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27. As you tense, the metal actually (creaks) and bends out the sides and you just tear the cage off of the top of you. That's your action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's your whole action?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got bonuses and stuff, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You have your bonus action if you're still raging, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I do!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Waking up!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to throw-- Oh, I just see a column of fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just see a column of fire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I see a motherfucker behind me, don't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He going to turn to jelly. Do I have my movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to visit him, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently with his eyes smoking from being seared with a Sunbeam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hi! Smash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, he's blinded, so you have advantage automatically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yay! Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Can you imagine if you had been attacking the pit fiend?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I know!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Smear him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 24-- That's two additional damage die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like a fat mosquito.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. They were all three really low-damage die rolls. Oh! Actually, I can reroll a one or a two, which was that last one! Nine, that's better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doesn't matter, you killed him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doesn't matter, he's dead. He's so dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you turn around and see him there, you go, "Hi," wham. He's going (hisses) and hears this "Hi" and his entire head collapses inward and you shove it down to about the height of the rest of his shoulders. He just (wet collapsing noises) to the ground, and just crumples. And then burns into ash and just cinders left behind. Destroyed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's beautiful, is what it is. Ending Grog's turn, Percival, you're up.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Wait, can I take my last thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah, that's right! What're you going to do with your bonus?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right, so I can only move or I can only use my bonus action, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yeah.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay, well, I'm just going to cast Curse of Mutual Suffering on Utugash one more time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You currently do not have visual range on him, you can't see him. Does it say, for the curse, that you need to be able to see the creature? That's the question, let me look.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It just says, "a creature within 30 feet."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can! Curse of Mutual Suffering does hit Utugash, are you going to amplify it, or not?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Am I going to what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Amplify it, or leave it as it is?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to amplify it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll your d8 and take d8 damage.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is six for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: And then I'm going to throw my bear arms wide and just like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Come at me, bro? (laughter)

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: 'Sup, asshole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm going to reload. Because boy, I'm out.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Bubble throat!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, that's right! I was, like, what? What? Bubble-- Yeah. (gravelly mumbling) Got a little thing. I didn't know it had a name, and now it's the obvious name for it. It's bubble throat. I'm going to swing back around and back up a little bit, and I'm going to take three more potshots at that bone, because that's what I can see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to get close to him. I'm going to back up a bit. Just back up in the middle of the room. I'm going to keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About there? Sure. Go for it and take your attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing fancy, attack number one: that's 26 to hit. And that's nine points of piercing damage, five points of necrotic damage, and two points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, as you're looking across the room, you see the bone devil (hisses), and it rears back, and the wings span out, it looks like he's about to leap. And as it takes its jump, you watch its face explode forward with dark crimson, just, mist, as the head is blown off of its shoulders.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get that Grit back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Better! And I'm going to see if I can-- Is there anything? I've got two more shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one creature in here that you can barely see through the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I can? Oh, all right, let's do that, that's funny. Another shot at that guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is really hard to see some of these people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Red creatures on dark red. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: That's plenty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So that's 7d6 plus six. One, two--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the other you hear (wings flapping) fly off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (very deep voice) I imagine he's going to tell the others. Oh, this Shapechange has so many weird things!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I have a moment, I'm going to look in all those doors really quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run over to Percy and give him a kiss and say, nice shooting, stud, and I'm going to help him look.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to wait one second, not to look in those doors. But that happens. And then-- Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fantastic!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your AC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The lance ricochets off your chest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you seeing this? Are you all seeing this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that's the Tempest, that's the Tempest, man. That's Kiki, that's Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, Tary! I'm Antlers!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Good day to you, miss. I've misjudged you again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fist bump.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shout through the window, loot the body! And I keep looking in the things with Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first room that you go into contains a fair amount of gold, and it's just stashed--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We pull it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This small stash here is about 12,300 gold pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings) Yeah! Putting that in the stash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also find your equipment. You find your maul and your armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 12,300, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12,300 gold. So you have that at your disposal now.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT, TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Your bear-kini.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're putting your armor on, you open the far door on this end, and as you do, suddenly bursting through is a lemure. (groans) Comes towards you with its horrible, fleshy mound just reaching out in your direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I threaten it down, and say, run. And owe Orthax your freedom. Run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an intimidation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, can I use Friends to help with that or no, just go for intimidation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'll use Friends to add to that intimidation. So, is that advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. That's cocked. That's fine anyway. Intimidation is, ugh, eight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say "Run!", and you see the whole-- the lemure goes (curious grunt).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I shoot my gun next to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shoot an arrow into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then the arrow strike comes right after.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax Dagons onto Keyleth's shoulder and watches all this through the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It misses. His hand slaps against the front of your armor and (slurping, groan), and then roll your attack.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (laughs) This is a great confrontation!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good weird, but it's weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The arrow (impact noise) through its head, and it just immediately falls to the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like I'm losing it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He should've listened. You were very clear, dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's in the other room? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of the chambers here, you find most of it is a collection of rotting meats. You find various sulfurous chemicals, some that you can't really, by scent and texture, identify.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If there's anything interesting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five vials, specifically.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything on the body? On the giant? On the pit fiend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Utugash? There's the axe that Utugash had, which is this very, very large black, metal heated axe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see that, please?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I pick him up by his ankles and schoolyard bully-style shake him out from his feet, upside-down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For pocket change?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For pocket change.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most pit fiends, or at least devilish creatures of his stature, don't keep his belongings hidden anywhere on himself. They're visible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a pretty big meatball.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some spicy meatball.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does the axe do anything when I hold it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's roughly twice the size of any axe you've held and is too large for you to use.

lines.name: LAURA, NOELLE
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I really think that's a matter of perspective?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you like me to identify the object?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Weakly limps over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aye, I'll take a look at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's referred to as a Black Iron Axe of Corruption. It's used primarily as a means of intimidating and scaring off lessers, and keeping subordinates in line.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With magic, or just with size?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both. It's a minor enchantment. The enchantment of it, you get the essence as you look at it, the power of it was part of the presence of the pit fiend, it was an inherent ability, so yeah. This is not considered a very powerful magical item. It was only powerful in the hands of a pit fiend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take it. Can I put it in the pool of blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. (sizzles)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It dissolved it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but the heat of it just naturally being in the space, it steams as it goes in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a deep pool, you guys. Like seriously, drowning warning, okay?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So wait, who are you guys again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pop Trinket out of the necklace and cast Cure Wounds on him.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Why are you here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tax collectors.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were running-- let's just say, we had a grudge and we took care of it.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right, works for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about you? Where are you from?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (sighs) I came here with friends. I don't know if they're still alive, the ones-- well, most of them are dead. I don't know if the other two are still alive, but they're in prison. I've got to rest up. I've got to get back and find them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they like you?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: What do you mean, like me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean like (roars)?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Like bears? They're not bears.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, they're in the prison?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I Shapechange back to Keyleth for a second. Do you know which section of the prison they're in?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Utugash, he bought me. He was going to, I guess corrupt my soul, or whatever, but good luck with that, dude! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, does the Bastion of Flesh sound familiar?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't heard the term. You weren't given a lot of information. Most of your presence once you were captured was just being dragged through hallways, tortured, chained up and then eventually purchased and brought here to be perpetually tortured by Utugash until these guys found you.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Honestly, I have no idea what's going on still. It's been a hard time in hell. It doesn't sound familiar, but I guess I know where my friends might be. I've got to get back and see if they're still alive, if they're still in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As she's saying this, Trinket goes and grabs some of the rotting meat out of one of those and brings it to her as a present.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I accept it. Thanks, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And just gives you a big lick on the side of the face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you still a bear?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm a dwarf again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No she's a dwarf.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, are you going to hand it over here now? Thanks.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All yours. All yours, pal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it really rotten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's on par with what you ate before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you know your way around if you went back to the prison? I mean, do you think you'd know your way through the halls?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I think so. I think I'd be able to-- with my bear smell, I think I could find my way back at least to where my friends were. Yeah, I can't leave them in there: if they're still in there, I have no idea, but I came here to help my friend, he made a contract with a devil, and we came here to try and get him out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Terrible idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The worst idea you could ever do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we did that, no?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't know what you're talking about, Tary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Percy signed it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No we didn't.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Don't. It's a bad idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Since the little ones got away, do we want to turn this into a walk-and-talk?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe we should get out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, okay, hang on. What happens next? Because aren't we supposed to be arrested next?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but we can check out the place until they get here. Can we check the rest of the room first, before we leave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Especially that back wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But being very careful for traps because they are present here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not me, necessarily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, so Grog, you're taking point?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Grog, you enter this chamber, and it opens up into this candelabra area. As you pass this area, I need you to make a dexterity saving throw, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. You take a few steps and then on one of the stone slabs beneath you, a glyph suddenly brightly shines with a strange, pinkish-orange glow, and then you guys watch as a column of somewhat translucent, ethereal energy shoots up, engulfing Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you fucking doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer 21 points of psychic damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelps) I'm too smart again! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I fly in alongside. You know, all you have to do is ask. Will you hold still and give me ten seconds? And I'll check the rest of the room, just in case.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew, what is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is another one of the boiling blood chambers you saw earlier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm just going to check for traps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like Crimson Peak as much as the next person, but this is kind of over it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30? Okay, as you scan the room, you do notice on the inside of each one of these pillars is another one of the similar platforms to the one that Grog triggered, and the one that he triggered here, there are about two, in width.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's spots on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this whole area here, and this area, and there's one here, and one here, and all these can be triggered.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I see anything of value or anything else in the room, besides the traps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but what you do notice-- Vax, you and Vex, and Keyleth, who have the highest passive perception-- you hear from the ceiling above you, what sounds like multiple entities landing on the roof.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, we've got to am-scray.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think reinforcements are here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is definitely what we talked about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I see anything that looked like guards that wore like the armor? The gold armor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in the interior, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, throughout the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you are right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just in general, since I've been in hell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen the different types. You've seen a couple that have been imps, you've seen a few that have been winged humanoid entities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Were there any like erinyeses or succubuses that were also guards that would be one of these people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't see any of that, specifically.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to be okay. We were expecting this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, but I could still be a guard and follow you guys there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'm someone on the outside and not in prison as maybe a first responder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you're overthinking this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a big prison. I think you're going to be very far away from us very quickly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I say, hey, I found these guys, and I walk with you guys all the way to the prison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A hatch from the ceiling in this chamber in here kicks open and about a dozen entities come dropping in, some winged, others like spined similar bearded devils, some of them wearing the golden armor of the Whisperers you've seen throughout the city. It seems that the guard have been called to the assault on this stronghold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get Trinket back in the necklace really fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket's in the necklace. What's everyone else doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I stealth? Can I turn into one of the impish creatures in gold armor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Yeah, okay. You turn into an imp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have they seen me yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't create equipment, so you would be an imp. You'd have to put on gold armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have the gold armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you'd just be an imp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Never mind. I'll just be myself for right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, you're remaining as Keyleth's half-elf form. All right! What's everyone else doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I drank a healing draught, and I am getting my lance ready, and I'm staying with fucking Doty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In which of these rooms did that trap door open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It opened here. Grog was waiting over to the side. Grog, these entities landed near you, they just kinda (rumbles), about a dozen of them just swarm into the chamber near you. Vax, you're over here on the side as you're figuring out the traps in this area in the center. So they have been kind of behind you in this area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to walk towards Grog. I'm going to join him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You join up with Grog here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds on myself really fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, we'll say for the purposes of the swarming of entities in this chamber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's all been seen? That's a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got Dis.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Are we all in there? Who's in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys all going to join? You're staying with Doty?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm staying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Percival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to see if I can try to start fixing him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You need workshop materials to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, then I won't do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: MATT. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are those bone demony guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bone demons, an erinyes enters, bearded devils, cambions. A whole swarm comes in here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll turn into one of the bone devils.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A chain devil lands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll turn into a bone devil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You turn into bone devil form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Her game, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you resist or do you surrender?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm taking my cues from you, here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (high-pitched) We surrender.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We surrender, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't say it. You've got say it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I surrender, and he's coming along.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will accept this as universal surrender." Puts his arms up and you watch as a number of these individuals begin pulling heavy chain manacles out from sacks and satchels. Two of them immediately charge up and begin shackling Grog, multiple layers of chain and manacles across your arms and legs. They shackle you up and begin to spread into the next room, coming to the rest of you guys. They charge in and begin just, throat manacle, to arms, to ankles, each with somewhat slack chains and has a specific lead chain attached to the center of the whole ensemble. They go from person to person, they throw them on you, though you angrily give in to it. Keyleth, as you approach, one of them turns to you and goes (speaks Infernal).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (speaks fake Infernal)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking hell!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You tried Parseltongue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you say you want to go to the disco with me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight. Total.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm not a butt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leans in real close to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give him a little bit of a twitch, like maybe I'm the damaged bone devil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Liar!" The wings (angry fluttering noise) behind it as it points its finger at you. A bunch of the devils begin to swarm in from the sides with the various polearms and jagged weapons pointed in your direction. "Reveal thyself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god. Okay, I drop form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're standing there with your spear out, they all begin to swarm around you. Taryon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say, oh no, whatever will we do. We have this enormous piece of equipment that you don't understand and could possibly be very dangerous and probably should be locked up with the rest of us. Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't seem to be paying any mind. They throw the manacles on you. They subdue you very quickly with a swift hit to the back of your shoulders, your sense of bravado is immediately crumbled. They throw you to the ground and chain you up. You are all then chained together and brought to your feet as one of the bone devils approaches. "You are found in the seeding stages "of usurpation of a trusted of Dispater and are sentenced to moral reassignment and delivery. You "are forfeit to Mentiri." Grabs the chains, tugs, and you guys all begin to be pulled out and then up through the hatch in this chamber, through multitudes of devilish arms. They are pulling you up through the ceiling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a good plan! Good plan!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's actually working better than I expected.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over your shoulder and watch as a series of devils have now leapt onto Doty and are pulling him apart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! This is the part where C-3PO is being pulled apart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He served his purpose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we're going to take a break.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He read you bedtime stories.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Be back after a short break here. They're going to show a few ads and then the Signal Boost episode that Marisha just put out. We'll continue our story here in just a few minutes, guys. See you in a moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw, Doty, poor bastard! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This'll be coming your way soon, signed by the cast of Critical Role.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Killer!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex and Vax, go ahead and roll perception checks, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vex, as this is happening and you watch Percival recoil from the impact, you glance with a bit of a sneer towards the crowd and you watch amongst all these various toothy, hissing devils, you see one familiar red-skinned man with long-ish dark hair, horns curled up, and as his eyes meet yours, he gives you a smile. And steps back with the crowd as it closes around him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I breathe a little easier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a dexterity check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. You catch it in your mouth. And it is filthy. You don't even know what it is. You regret the impulse immediately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (spits)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you all walk past, his eyes catch yours and he gives you a nod as he sears it in the body of the half-elf, who begins to quiver and scream against the chains. But he just gives you the rest of the head nod as you pass, cross the door, not seeing them any further.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't do this. I can't go in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear, as you leave past the doorway, you hear a voice echo from the chamber you just passed, "I'll see you soon enough."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great. Can't wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're brought down another twisting series of intersecting halls, the smell growing more and more rancid the further in you go. You see three chain devils wander past, these roving jailers dragging broken bodies behind them in manacles similar to yours. You see trails of blood streaking across that are slowly turning dry and thick with caked, drying blood, some bits turning to mist across the hot stonework of the interior of the prison. A twitch of one of the legs reveals that these bodies are still living, though by but an inch of their life. A few errant chains that drift and drag behind them creepily caress the arm and face of Taryon as you pass, just across your cheek. One of them scratches you with a hook at the tip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You fall unconscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we're walking, I'm going to whisper to Percy. Are they going to take all our stuff?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't do anything without my stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your weapons have been gathered and they have been taken from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everything? Armor? Helmets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your armor on you, still. Your helmet is not currently on you, that's been taken off. But your weapons have been taken from you because you can't hold your weapons in your chains.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a break of contract.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A single, towering chain devil sits within, larger than any you've encountered. The broad shoulders are almost as wide as Grog's, and the head is so deeply set within the neck that it almost gives a profile from shoulder to shoulder of a square. And it cross-- Nice.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck this asshole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they pull, it pulls your arms up over your body and your leg manacles are attached to similar rings on the ground. One by one, you are all placed within this chamber, chained up, helpless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the worst.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He approaches the bars as he closes the entranceway to the cell, so he's on the other side of the cell from all of you. You're just strung up in there and he's pressed up against the bars from the other side, his hands clutching as he stares across you, his eyes slowly scanning. As he moves his hands down the bars, the chains go limp and unfurl around parts of his arms and begin to snake and slither across the ground, a dozen of them or so slowly creeping like tendrils of living entities towards all of you as he says, "You seem "weary. Let's loosen your load." As the chains begin to snake their way up each of your bodies, Grog, you feel one come up your torso and under the gauntlets and begin to loosen the gauntlets on your arm underneath. Vex, you feel as one curls up, spirals around your leg and finds its way under your armor, and eventually finds the buckles in the back and begins to undo them. All of you find the chains are all beginning to move--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saw this movie! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unspoiled. Unharmed. Now, to guide you." And the creature walks up to the bars, and clutches the sides staring at you. "You seek Hotis, yes?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He is under the ceiling of Iskath, though Iskath is not in Mentiri this day. You must leave "this room, turn right, left, straight, straight, left, straight, then right. The iron door with the "fanged grin bears the mark. There lies your quarry. Now! My debt is paid! Goodbye." And the devil turns around and begins to run out of the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit I missed the last thing that he said. I got all the directions, but I didn't hear the very last thing that he said.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Door with a grin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Door with a grin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Door with a fanged grin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, left, straight, straight, left, straight, right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait I got right, left, straight, straight, left, straight, right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I've got, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, left, yeah, right, left, straight, straight, right, left, straight?

lines.name: LAURA, LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, left, straight, straight, left, straight, right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out. We'll find out who got the right one. But the devil just leaves.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: And we're still strung up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're all still strung up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't get my phone call!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start doing something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to try to lockpick, too.

lines.text: Your lockpick was taken with your equipment-- unless you were hiding one, you would have to specify.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not the one in my mouth. Okay, how about this. I'm going to pop Trinket out of the necklace--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait, do we have the necklace?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They wouldn't have taken it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The necklace was not taken off you. It was just your satchels, equipment, and your armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab the necklace and I go, Trinket, get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket emerges. (sneezes)

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Bless you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Allergic to hell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket! Get us out of here! Hey, okay, here's the thing. Can you go over and get anything out from between those two bars, on the outside of the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket goes over to the edge of the bars and leans into them and is marking a claw across the ground and it's about a good foot away from the equipment and you can see that smoke begin to rise

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you get that?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes! Dead for a ducat, it's dead! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five experience to Sam Riegel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Five experience.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see that the fur is beginning to send off smoke smoke and burn against the bars as he's leaning against them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you can try and just break through these manacles. Can you do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reaches up and grabs the one around your ankle and tugs, and you see it begin to singe the outside of his tongue. And he's pulling. Make a strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Okay. Okay. 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. The chain on one of your ankles begins to bend. It's not quite-- doesn't fully break. But you can see that it's getting some headway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to pull my leg at the same time and see if I can help him out at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I suck at strength checks. Okay. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Okay. Between both Trinket and you pulling, you do manage to get one of the chains to (snapping sound), and you get one ankle free.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great, I have an ankle free. Hey, guys! Guess what? My ankle's free.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Lucky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am really flexible. This does nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you Druidcraft into my hand? Can you give me a thorn, something long and thin?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Keyleth, what can you do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I could probably also Beast Shape out of this if I really wanted to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck, Keyleth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you really want to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you know, I was kinda waiting to see what everybody else did.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Less talking, more doing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. And I Beast Shape into a rat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you do that to all of us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Technically, yeah. And then I shape back to Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's amazing. Every time. Every time.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry. There's no keys to the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, there's just a pile of--

lines.text: Yeah, just get the lockpicks.

lines.text: Which are in the satchel on the other side of the bags, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, bring it over here, love.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any extra? You can pass them to me and I can maybe help.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Already doing it while she's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there any other extra lockpicks in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I at disadvantage or anything because I'm--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, because you're strung up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Investigation check?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're rummaging through the bag, trying to find it, you're like, I know it's in here somewhere!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honey, you're a hoarder. We really need to clean out your purse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just fucking let me out of this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I start with my sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you eventually get both of your arms and ankles undone, you go up to your sister. She's still looking through the pouch. Roll for Vax-- for Vex.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try and just muscle out this bitch, since I'm still wearing my Gauntlets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 27 again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get her wrists undone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I'll just hit the whole group, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I really can't find any--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog just pulls his manacles off the ceiling. The chain (snapping sound). You break them off your wrists.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to go over and start trying to do the lockpick. Oh, actually, I don't have any lockpicks on me, still, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's across the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hand her a spare.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, thanks. He gives me a spare and I start trying to work on the door while he's doing the others.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you go over and grab a spare from her pouch. You guys begin-- we'll say over the next five minutes or so-- getting everyone undone at this point. You pull-- you have the chains still dangling from your wrists, the manacles still attached to your Titanstone Gauntlets, but you're free.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I kinda maybe wrap them around, just for a little super there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hell chains.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hell chains.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As I get Tary out. We're going to be fine, this is going to be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can see you shaking. It's going to be all right. You're with us.

lines.text: No. You're an idiot-- I mean, no thank you, Grog. I lash out when I'm nervous and I don't have my belongings.

lines.text: Oh, you have that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.text: Okay, so go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27? You get partway into it, and you feel it's moving but it's a very, very difficult lock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rest my chin on her shoulder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just, come over, and--

lines.text: Is it a sticky one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's really, really tough. I could have done the chains on all of us, and you could have done this, but whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Rather than do it, I just grab a hold of her elbow and I shift her to the side and feel through her bones into the lock and--

lines.text: Go for a roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going through my bones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tova, can't you just curse the lock?

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: Oh, it broke!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would anybody care if I try mine?

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kame--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- hame--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try to do it quietly. Just quiet. Just quiet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- what do you mean, quiet? I can't hold it, it's so powerful, oh! (yells) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfucking door.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no! He's been doing everybody.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: Right. That's 18 to see if you hit, so go ahead and roll damage. For the purposes of this roll, roll 1d4 and add your strength modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Strength modifier, that's ten!

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, with your one-fist punch, between the damage you had done to the lock by messing with it, and the impact of your fist, the lock shatters, and the door squeaks open.

lines.text: You loosened it for me. Nice job.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I reach through and try to grab everything in, pass it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I cast--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, nope, let's just--

lines.text: I think it would be best if maybe we, I mean, I don't know how well we can stealth around here, if we should maybe turn into insects and just crawl around here.

lines.text: I can do that to us.

lines.text: I think we should do that.

lines.text: Is everyone cool with that?

lines.text: But I've definitely got a Pass Without a Trace still on us.

lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Solid. Copy on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we could be hornets, or flies?

lines.text: Have I seen anything, like flies or rats or anything like that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not insects.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not insects.

lines.text: You've seen rats, but they don't do well here because of the heat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's flies all over this shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe hummingbirds, something, the teensiest bird you can think of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not in the woods though. Flies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, I've seen rats, and I've seen what? Have I seen any--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't be insects, we can only be animals.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got to be beasts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so teeny teeny teeny, like, finches or hummingbirds.

lines.text: Are there anything like bats? Have I ever seen any bats?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, bats, down here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever, as long as we're flying, maybe we can be stealthy. We'll be stealhty bats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just walk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, technically, with Animal Shapes, I can change us with an action. Correct?

lines.text: That's true. I think so, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we can just shift in and out whenever we want? With an action?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, as long as we don't get caught.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't mind starting out that way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I think getting-- yeah, we should, it's easier to not get caught. And then we'll stealth as bats.

lines.text: Stealthy bats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bats?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.text: What do our bats sound like?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Where is Harvey Dent?" (high-pitched squealing)

lines.text: Okay. This is concentration, so this will get rid of your Shapechange.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct. So as long as we're cool with me losing my ninth-level Shapechange. I can't escort us as an erinyes anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we should just walk, but if you want to do this, you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, wait! Well--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we'll just-- there's a lot of demons around here. Devils.

lines.text: You don't speak that shit, is the problem.

lines.text: You're not quite certain, but it's pushing close to an hour.

lines.text: Yeah, you don't speak the shit, so even if you have it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't speak the shit. So, bats!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealthy bats. We fly close to the ceiling and be as quiet as possible.

lines.text: I don't care for this.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Bears, bats--

lines.text: Wait, I can technically make some of us bats and some of us other things, correct? I can choose.

lines.text: Yup.

lines.text: They can see!

lines.text: Take off, I'll follow you.

lines.text: Essentially, you get--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: Anybody can disengage as an action, it's just a combat action. You just can't do anything else, the only thing you can do is move with your speed after that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you disengage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- and then fly as far as I can towards the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where you get.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take off to the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which way is the right? You guys moved in this way? So, this way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So using your dash action--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was the last thing, it was to the right was the final turn. Right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yup, yup.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, yeah, to the right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been holding an action, right? Can I burn that as a dash action?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! Why did he say it like that, like it was--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, as far as we know, the right means right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it's stage right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But everything else was-- I'm going to the right. That's the last intersection that I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go where she went. And further if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you are off the page, over that way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I burn my action as a dash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm burning my action as a dash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bye!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Toodles. As much as we can be, toodles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dear god, I can't believe this shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep booking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, ten, 30, and you also with a double move get to there. Okay. Next up is Tova.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, I'll just keep going with the rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just keep going? All right, so you catch up with these guys here way off the map. All righty. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to burn my "ashton" as a "darsh." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gibberish) All righty. With that, the spine devils are going to move forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is that? Is that Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it is? No, but Percy's off the map!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry. It's Keyleth. Yeah, because I have one-two, but you guys both transformed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I was holding my movement to move with Vex.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: You can't hold movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't fucking hold a movement. I did an action to make sure they were bats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. So you get swarmed by three spined devils.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking balls. This is not good planning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We might be able to outrun them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in this form. Attacks against you. Yep, that's an 18. Keyleth, you take six points of slashing damage. Your bat form is gone, you drop that. You become Keyleth again and you take five points of damage carried over. Then it's going to get its tail attack against you. It's going to miss. The other one's going to bite. Miss. Tail attack is going to be a 17. What's your AC?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Currently, 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last one's going to get its last two attacks on you. That is a 21 and a natural one. So the last attack you get is four points of slashing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it's six plus four total? So, ten? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I need you to go ahead and make three concentration checks. It's got to beat ten each time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good the first time. Good the second time. And seven plus my constitution, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So that is an 11 the third time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your constitution saving throw?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's enough. So you maintain concentration on the spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Solid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're welcome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bone devil flies up and is now going after Keyleth with all of its might.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we heal any? We didn't do any of that healing or anything, did we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope! You didn't have time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three attacks. That is going to be an 18 for its claw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second claw, that's a 27.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Concentration check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I'm about to go down. I make it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That is 12 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm down. Everyone's about to hit the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're all human now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you're all human.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you drop form. So four would be Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, got to fix this super fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really not looking good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody's far away from her except for me and-- who's the other person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw man, where did my Vex model go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, did I disappear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think I may actually have left you on the other map. That's okay, I'll be fine for this one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, because I was in a corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll use the erinyes for you. That's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay, that's pretty hot. Can you put a little marker on me so I can see it? I can't see the erinyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're welcome. Percival, Vax, Taryon, Tova.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy, my necklace is glowing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we all know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm not a bat. Does that mean Keyleth's dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're next in the initiative order.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, I've never been here. I don't want to die. Who do I do this to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just rolled it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did. It's a 13. Technically. Yeah. I was going to switch dice, but that's a 13, I'll take that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Was it the intentional roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's not-- Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm good. I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a 12. I rolled a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Still bleeding out. Man, losing that Plane Shift.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A success. What did you just say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, if she dies, we're fucked

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a big oversight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would've been campaign over. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we're good, guys. Come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That might be campaign over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, what the fuck were we thinking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so nervous right now, oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm up! I run forward and I slide on my knees and put my hand on her and cast Cure Wounds at 4th level. On Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm great, I'm good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw, man. That roll was bigger than I knew.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that would've been fucking bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have a spreading urgency of the entire prison of Mentiri now bearing down on escaped mortal criminals. Without Plane Shift, if that doesn't work...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, all right. So we have the extreme hint.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we were bats, Matt. That was pretty fine planning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was awesome. It was going great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 27 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You heal 27 points, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have a bonus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to heal yourself? Potions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pop Trinket out, as my bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whereabouts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Behind-- sure, whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say, just instinctually, you pop him out about there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that was my full movement and everything, wasn't it?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm conscious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I know.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 22 more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay. Vax! I'm at 49 hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bad News Bears.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long has it been since the pit fiend moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been roughly an hour. A little over an hour.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. And I'm going to, as a bonus action, chuck Whisper into-- no, it has to be tied to an action, doesn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, well there's nothing else I can do.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you help me up?

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not if you give it to somebody else.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Then I'm done.

lines.text: Do you have any spells? Like a Bless or anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm out.

lines.text: How far away am I?

lines.name: MATT
