lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll run back then, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You'll get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bring everything in to use so you can just (poosh) to them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You have these three little spine devils that are like flying imps covered in spines that are relatively small, and you have one big bone devil-- that was the one that just almost killed Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll throw acid at one, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one who looks the meanest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 14. What's your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did this happen? How did we get here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points of acid damage to the bone devil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fiancee and campaign? Killed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as the vial breaks across the front of its body, you can see the acid burn its flesh. It curls into itself; you can see the smoke rising off of it as its flesh is beginning to burn and melt away. Nice. That's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I will cast Sanctuary on young Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the first time you've helped another person, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Taryon. All right, Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck sound at this point, I suppose. I'm going to run and just get them into view.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, you got them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Three shots, and I'm going to do a pushback on all three and I'm going to push them all--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spine devils, you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Spine devil, spine devil, bone devil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so there's three spine devils and one bone devil. So two spine devils and one bone devil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three spine devils and one bone devil?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Three spine devils and one bone devil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three spine devils and one bone devil?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stop saying it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No Coke, Pepsi.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No Coke, Pepsi. And the bone devil's a real problem, I suppose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's the dangerous-looking one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, in that case, I'm going to push him back. I'm going to do a shot to push him back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's a 19, 29--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pop-pop-pop, motherfucker!

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: (sing "mmmbop")

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my power song, you don't even know. 15 points of damage, plus five psychic, and he moves backwards ten feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 20 damage. He pushes back just that far, but he hits the wall. He can't get pushed back further.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can't get pushed any-- he's still--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy's in hell, Hanson playing in his brain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's already up against the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Second, I'll take a spine devil, the one that's threatening the most people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That song is not called "Doo-Bop." It's called "Mmmbop."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not the damage. Oh yeah. 17 points of damage and six points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You scatter one of the spine devils with one shot. Blasts apart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The other one, I'm going to spend a point for Grit for deadeye, just to get advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's cocked. 29?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 14 points of damage and one point of psychic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's still standing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still standing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Action surge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three more shots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three more?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hitting him again. Same thing, with a Grit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's good to do. 24 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. This is against the second spine devil, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 11 points of damage and four psychic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He scatters.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Third spine devil. Same thing-- actually, I get my Grit back. Third spine devil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These shots are (gunshots).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, actually, I'll reroll the cocked one, but it doesn't matter. Yeah. That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Echoing through the hall. Everyone who is ever searching for anything knows exactly where to go now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, fuck it. It's worth it, though. 13 points of damage and five psychic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Still standing, but looking rough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And another shot, same thing, with advantage. That's fine. 24?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank god they're easy to hit. That's 16 points of damage and four psychic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The third spine devil's upper torso is disintegrated by the blast. Its wings flick off to its sides, spattering part of the bone devil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to spend my last Grit. Last Grit is a shot to the spine devil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was already three attacks. That was three more attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was one, two--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you killed the second one, and then shot twice to kill a third one. So you're out of attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm done. Reload, and that's the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. At this point, you guys can hear distant yelling getting louder and louder down the hallway where you came from. You hear the voices echoing and swarming, and people are starting to get closer, knowing where you are. Tova, you're up.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: How many of these devil-guys are left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's just the one bone devil left.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to run back a full 45 feet. How close can I get to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 45? You can get about there. You're about ten, 15 feet from him. Ten feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got any projectile shit?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I do not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Need to heal?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That would help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have anything to heal with? (laughter)

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Don't think so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You hungry? Yeah. You have any food? (laughter)

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Who's closest to me, here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, it's Vax, the half-elf rogue guy.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I save my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because you haven't had a short rest, so you don't have your blood curses back, yeah.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, no, I don't have--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're just going to hold your action just in case it comes near?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, I'll just hang out with my new friends here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Sounds good. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go running in 50 feet. (war cry)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50 feet puts you standing over Keyleth, pretty much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I in melee distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are in melee distance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless attacks!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, kill it so we can run away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have a point of exhaustion, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 points of damage, all righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Second one, reckless. Natural 20.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From the gods.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, from the gods.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24, 27, 34. 34 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, did you double the dice?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did two additional damage dice rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so you did the first one--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Initial one, and then I did two more d10s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the total was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 34. All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, because I have two levels of brutal critical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great, so those are your two attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to the bone devil's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's still alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's still alive. And seeing everybody rush in and help this wounded creature on the ground--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Matt? Can I-- sorry, keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You sure?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I use the blood curses-- I can use it three times per short rest, so I have one more, right? I did two in the prison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two Mutual Suffering, and you did your Mark.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, you're right, okay. You're right. Did three. Sorry. Carry on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. All right, so. It's going to go ahead-- actually, no, let me roll to see which way it goes. Okay, yeah, it's not that intelligent. So intelligence check, you being the immediate threat, it turns attention towards you as opposed to Keyleth, who's currently on the ground. As you're the biggest threat to it at the moment, it's going to go ahead and make three strikes at you. That is 16?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ah, finally. Eight, eight, nine. (laughs) All right. That is 16 points of piercing damage, and no poison because you are immune.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends its turn, and it's going to shift over, flying over onto this way, the coasting in the center there, and getting over Keyleth, getting closer to the blood pool--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: May I make a retali--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Retaliation? Yes, you can. As a reaction, you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, kill it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless, please. 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 points of damage. As it flies over you through the air, you arc in the direction with your hammer, and as you do, it breaks its entire ribcage inward. You hear the shattering of bones, and it gives out this wheeze as you follow through and slam it back down where it was standing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sweet! (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth, can you do a Wall of Stone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, into the corridor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, block it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it here so they don't know which way we went.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They know the layout of this prison.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but they don't know which direction we went.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hear voices now coming from the other sides, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me do something. I'm going to use my Scroll of Programmed Illusion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have any creatures talked to us in Common down here? With their mouths, not with their minds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There have been a handful, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've been the cambion, the guy you met earlier with the red skin who made the deal with Percival.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The chain devil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chain devil spoke Common.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Did he work in the prison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The chain devil did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "They went that way!" And point down the hallway that we just came out of. "Go, get them now! Make "them pay!" (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. As you pull the scroll out, and you watch the scroll burst into flame as you finish the incantation, you watch as out of the blood pool, rising, this chain devil, looking real, material, steps up and walks over to the bodies and sits there looking over them, waiting for someone to trigger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we should put Dust of Tracelessness down. Dust of Tracelessness on the ground!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you start flower girling your way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hold my Wall of Stone, since he has that, because I don't want to make it apparent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're catching some ground here, and it's going well. Eventually you make your way--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus, there's another whole fucking map?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The doors, always. This is Matt Mercer we're talking about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm looking for fucking traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way down to the end of this chamber, and you see three different doors that are all closed off, to the front, to the right, and the left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fanged smiles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fanged smile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A chain golem slams into the center, its glowing red eyes from underneath. All right. As you guys have all scattered amongst these chambers you ran down, Vax just rushed up and began to inspect these here. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is this it? Is this where we're supposed to be?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got to find out which room he's in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Everyone roll initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. What size is that thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's almost 20 feet tall, and when it slams the ground, it's hunched forward. If it were standing upright, it would scrape the ceiling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So it's fire giant size.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bit under fire giant size, but you watch the chains from the ceiling are still attached to it. It's like the whole ceiling and upper portion of this chamber is made of chains that are feeding it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have anything to freeze?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To freeze? Yeah. We have our shit back, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we can freeze him in place, maybe. He's made of metal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tova. And what did you roll for your investigation check earlier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. This doorway, the first one you checked? Does not seem to have-- the symbol on it appears to be some sort of Infernal symbol that you don't recognize. All right. 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight for Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vex, you're up first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I run to the other doors that Vax has been looking at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one of these are you checking?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one of these doors are you checking?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The far one in the back. Yeah. And I'll look for the symbol.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. You go and look up, and this one has a symbol that looks like a half-moon that is broken and is bleeding into a pool below it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm looking for a fanged grin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a crescent half-moon that looks like it's broken in the middle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That totally could be a fanged grin. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The very back door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's your movement to get up there. And your action to look thoroughly and look at the symbol in the low light. You have a bonus still.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Is it possible to bonus hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have nowhere to hide from. You have nothing obscuring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing to obscure the view?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to use my bonus to pop Trinket out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket appears out of your necklace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess he was already out, wasn't he? Because we were running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a waste of bonus. (laughs) No, I'm going to Hunter's Mark. So Trinket was out. I'm going to Hunter's Mark the guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I'll go with it. Hunter's Mark on the chain golem. Tova, your turn.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to run over there behind the chain golem where Vex is. I'm going to do a perception check. I guess I'll check out this last door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I do a general sense of smell for the whole area and see if I smell anything coming from any of these prisons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make a perception check as you're rushing in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about symbols? Do you see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yep. All right. So that is a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one on the opposite side of the chamber has a weirdly iron, rusty old metal scent, and the doorway that you're at right now has a very strong scent of sulfur.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Is there anything on the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Where's investigation? That's an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You knock the dust from the side, and as you inspect closely, hearing the chains grinding and spinning around you, and occasionally you duck because you see one kind of whip across and break part of the stone and cause chunks of it to fly off. You look down, and you see two small eyes and one deep, toothy grin.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Hey, this one's smiling!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But is it a fanged grin? A fanged grin is usually cocked. But it looks more--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: He doesn't appear sincere, so. What do I have left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, as a note, just remember this, it took you a while to get there because the chains that were rolling around it are entangling and wrapping around the area, so you were at half movement, which got you just to there. I forgot to mention that earlier. However, the chains, in the process, are crushing and doing damage as you move through them. Six points of bludgeoning damage to you as you pull your way through the chains getting to that area. All right, that ends Tova's turn. It is now the chain golem's turn.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Do I have an extra action or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your action was to do the investigation. You have your bonus, if you have something to spend it with.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Turn into a bear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) "I turn into a bear?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And bear form. (sings) And bear form. There is your bear form. All righty. So ending Tova's turn, it is now the golem's turn. The golem has a ten-foot range on its slam. It's going to do two slam attacks. It's going to reach out and slam once at Percy, who is within its front range there after landing, and Keyleth, who's immediately to its left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't fucking die, Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 27 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You suffer 22 points of bludgeoning damage. And against Keyleth, that is a 25 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you take 21 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Sanctuary still working on her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rolled a two and had a zero wisdom modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's good, that's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These two red, beady points of light that form its eyes kind of shift to the back of its head, and now you see they're almost moving around, and it's keeping a visual range of everything in the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I get an attack of opportunity since we're moving out of its combat range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It was not in your combat range. It had reach, unfortunately. That ends its turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I need to stay alive. Who's close to me in a 30-foot radius? And who's looking rough?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone but Vex and Trinket are in a 30-foot radius.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I want to start backing out a little bit, and who's lowest on hit points? Legit.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: You.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I have 19 hit points left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me, Tova, Taryon, and I can pick three more people. I'm going to do a Mass Cure Wounds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who else wants it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take it. I'm at like two-thirds, I guess?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, you want it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyone else looking relatively low?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm not relatively low.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you can do it to everybody, why not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do it to six people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll say yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, so 3d8 plus six. Go for it. Percy, you're up next.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, that's amazing. Oh, that's a one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can reroll ones.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, only if it's elemental damage. Eight, 16, 17 plus six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six, so 23.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 23 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I'm backing out a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Backing this way or this way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way. If you move one more, he's going to get attack of opportunity on you because you're within melee range of him right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking hell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to risk it? Or not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll risk it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you transform anymore or are you spent?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do it one more time, but only to an animal, not an elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you back up. It takes a swing at you with its chain slam. That is 26 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Sanctuary still on her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Sanctuary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sanctuary. Thank you for reminding me. That is a 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your DC? 17?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On what? My spell DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, spell DC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. It goes to swing again towards you as a reaction and the magic prevents it from actually hitting its mark and the chains retract back into its body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So no damage is sustained.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, if I may be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Technically, he can choose another target.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going to be honest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, because he failed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it just says in Sanctuary you can either fail or he can choose another target.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. All right, so instead--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry. Just saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So to Vax, that is a 31.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take the 30 points of damage instead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're taking it for me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, I am.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, boyfriend!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against Tova that is a natural one.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That's a what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one to hit you. So it actually slams into the door above.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it break through the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll make a strength check now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Happy to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door cracks and it partially gets pushed inward. Somehow the chain golem actually helped you out. That's interesting. All right. That ends its turn. Keyleth, you're up. No, sorry, that was Keyleth's turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm out of its range now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently just out of its range.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to back up a bit. Move me behind that-- and then move me-- the other pillar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Head that way. Does it look like those chains are feeding it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't look like it's feeding it more than just the chains are keeping it attached to the walls. The mass of the chains are still in its chest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it has eyeballs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has some sort of two glowing light sources within the mass of chains that form where its head would be--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would a headshot to those eyeballs actually be a thing that might work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try it. I'm going to burn a thing and see if that does it. So. Yeah. Let's find out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up next, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right. Yeah, that'll do. 32 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. That's a d10 and d6. That's 11 points of damage and three points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it has to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not, actually, because it's not affected by that effect. Its eyes can shift throughout its body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no snapping, breaking the glass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man, you made me burn a Grit. That sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Even with its spell advantage against all those Sanctuary saves, it just doesn't have a very high wisdom so it just cannot make it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do a sharpshooter shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two more. Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was shot one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shot one. You have two more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shot two. That's a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's, ooh. 27 points of damage. And five psychic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. 32, all righty. Last attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And another shot, same thing, sharpshooter. Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's cocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have too many dice on there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does 14 hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 does not hit. Sorry, thought that was the damage. Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. And then I'm going to stay in but keep an eye on everything that's happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did suffer five points of bludgeoning damage as the chains are just swirling around and the aura and the area of its vicinity just shreds like a slow-moving grinder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I move out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I healed? Okay. So I'm at 60 points, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get it, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where am I on the map?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, perfect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, door-- smash it open, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. Roll an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Crack of doom. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll damage for your hammer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the door blows open, you glance inside. You can see within the walls are covered in pulse-y, fleshy, muscle-like substance with these long stretched tendons and pieces of sinew that all gather to the center, and you see this shifting larval egg. And within, you can see a small humanoid figure that is swirling and writhing within. It seems like it's in this perpetual state of agony, screaming quietly within this weird fleshy egg sac and you can see the features of a tiger-like face and fangs writhing inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking, umbilical cord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have one more hit. I'll stride forward and swing away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you step forward, the chain golem already used its reaction so it cannot. You just walk forward. Make an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because why not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because why not. That's a million. It's 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A million.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Million.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now just to get out of here, because you hear the voices in the distance now getting--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now we just have to Plane Shift.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: What is happening?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it done?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. How much movement do I have left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was you. Because of the chains wrapping around you-- which, by the way, did five points of bludgeoning damage to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes you half movement to move through that space so that's five, ten, 15, 20, 25, 30. So you can move two more squares.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two more squares. I'll come back out the door and towards Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That'll get you about there. And that's as far as you can get. The chains are tangling you up and preventing you from moving quickly. Ending Grog's turn. Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we're done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get to Keyleth. We have to be touching her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll move to Keyleth and say: Tova, are you coming with us? You have to, sort of.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Where are you going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To another plane of existence. But one without chain golems trying to kill you.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I can't. I can't leave my friends. I have to try and find them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go next to Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you step in next to her over the grate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What would help you get out of here?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'll have that invisibility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Invisible bear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Tova vanishes in the moment, and is this slight ripple in the air.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Phantom bear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is where you are. Tova's form vanishes.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: How long does that last?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A minute.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Run real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the minute you take damage, you become visible again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Invisibility lasts an hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It lasts an hour?! Oh! Hey, you can get out with that.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Going to try and do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's like: okay, I've got to get-- (poof)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'm going to run forward and try to get to-- I'm going to poof Trinket in and run forward and try to get to Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Ten, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35. That's as far as you can get, right there. Make a double dash?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 25, 30. That's as far as you get, and you take eight points of bludgeoning damage from the chains that are whipping around you and wrapping around your legs and tying you up as you're reaching forward. It's like this swamp of grinding metal. That ends your turn. Tova. You're invisible. If you do any attacks, you lose invisibility, so either you're going with them, or you're retreating into the prison for better or for worse.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I run over, pick up Vex, and carry her over to her friends? 45.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Vex down?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: No. She can't move any more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35, 40. You get right up next to her, right there. She's light enough. You lift her up, and you make a dash action to bring her over for half speed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, 20. You get her just there, within range of Keyleth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so confused.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You just got carried by an invisible bear!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take five points of bludgeoning damage, reduced to half because you're in your bear form, so you take two points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is very comfortable for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The golem's turn now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Am I on the ground again? Did you put me down?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, I put you down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I mean, unless you want to be airplaned up by an invisible bear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I'm not opposed, but.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The golem is going to make a chain prison attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A chain prison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really going to just try to kill us before we can get out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to-- let's see here. It's going to get Percy, Keyleth, and Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shitballs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you guys to all make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Gil. Oh, that's good, Gil!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm feeling lucky. Thank god. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? That's exactly what you needed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 19 plus four, 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a dex saving throw, and 20 is what we need? I'm going to use a resolve and see if I can make this work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope. Same thing. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. So everyone else, you guys both manage to break free. Percy, you are restrained.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gods damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the chains swirl up and wrap around your legs and torso and you find yourself bound in place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we make a chain?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we make a chain, we can reach over to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, like Guardians of the Galaxy, you guys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm holding my turn and reaching out and trying to make this chain as much as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to begin casting the spell and holding the release of it until?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As soon as everyone links hands, we're out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the start of your turn, you take nine points of bludgeoning damage from the chains that are swirling around you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fine. Can I do a bonus action to heal-- who's looking rough?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You. Heal yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just heal your-fucking-self.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm at 59 hit points. I'm going to heal myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 2nd-level Healing Word? 1st-level?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. 2nd-level. That's four plus another three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So seven plus six. 13. You heal 13, and you begin casting Plane Shift. You pull out of your side satchel the tuning fork that you have attuned to where? Where are you going to be casting this towards?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 73. Sorry, 73 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What location are you shifting towards, Keyleth, as you begin the spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Home. Whitestone. Exandria.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Focusing on Whitestone in Exandria, you begin to cast the incantation. You see the power in her hands begins to glow, but she's holding it back. She's concentrating hard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I just take whatever leftover action I have to be like, Vox Machina, come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and break out of this chain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make a strength check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20. Golden snitch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strength check or strength save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. You can't break the chains. They're too strong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I use an action surge to try and do it again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because you get two now, at this level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, I've got one more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't break free. The chains are holding you in place. Ending your turn. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's the one who's back there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's Vax. He can dash.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, I would like to move towards Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, at the start of your turn, Grog, you take seven points of bludgeoning damage from the swirling chains.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reduced to three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's five, ten, 15, 20, 25, 30. What's that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50. You get right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary and Grog can hold hands in that position, right? He can reach Tary and Percy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just need a chain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Taryon is right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so can he reach his hand out and have Percy and Tary?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone would need to shift one more in that direction, or someone can plug that hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I need to break your chains or just touch you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just touch will work.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. I just grab your hand, and I'll lean back like this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, he's super tall. Can he reach farther because he's super tall?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you-- and push through, and I'm going to try to use my bonus to push all the way through and fill that gap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You may have to throw the knife.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just barely, with the chains that are around you-- which by the way, Vax, you take eight points of bludgeoning damage. You can just get up to put the ring into Tova's hand, and that's as far as you can get.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have an action and bonus action. Can't I use the bonus action to dash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please, please, please.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Come on, guys. Get out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please, just let him get there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, 30. You're not quite there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, well, I grab Keyleth's hand and we're going to work on closing this gap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you dashed with your bonus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My action wasn't to give her the ring?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, you feel for her. That's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you throw your dagger and hit me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can't do anything else. You can't hit me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've just got one teeny little gap here, and whose turn is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, technically Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Me? I'm right there, aren't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I bridge the gap somehow?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can he yank Vax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your action to try and pull him over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To pull Vax over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fill the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do take seven points of bludgeoning damage from the chains.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god. Stress.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Friends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Out, out. Go, go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You fucking ass. Goddamn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull him into the space. Everyone grabs hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, not you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Tova's form appear briefly as she puts the ring on and then vanishes once more. You see the rest of them grab arms together. Keyleth, you finish the spell, Plane Shift.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'll look you up if I make it out of here alive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Please!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The ring's a loaner!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: We've still got to get that beer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Greystone Keep! Get my robot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got to live, Tova. You've got to live!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'll do my best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm doing great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, Matthew!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys. Oh shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've got to Bilbo Baggins your way out of that shit!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm in a much better position than I was to start with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy crap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's just hope Tova doesn't come across another pit fiend, because they can see through invisibility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are devils that can see through invisibility.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm sure it will be fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure you'll be fine. It'll be great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Worst case scenario, she ends the day where she started.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a really fun episode. That was a really fun game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was awesome, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like that was the most fun that we've had in a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chain golems, all the demons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so tired!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was fun. Guys, well done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We made it out, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Noelle, thank you so much for playing with us.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: This was fucking awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Such a blast. Good sticking to the guns and staying behind. I was like, I don't know what she's going to do about this. Thinking you were going to find a way to find them.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's happened before. Our story ended up keeping Rothfuss here for three or four weeks in a row. It was supposed to be just a one-night thing.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I had a mission.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He got a killing blow on a boss, too. We've had two guests get killing blows on a boss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've had good themes of guests killing bosses.

lines.name: LAURA, MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because Mary killed the white dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. You guys have got to pick up your slack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe your ghost can haunt us. "Remember when you left me in hell?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good times.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Or it'll just be me with the invisibility ring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much for coming and playing with us, Noelle.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Thank you for having me. This has been awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yay. So guys, once again, you can check out Noelle. If you want to pimp your stuff real fast before you leave? Nimona!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look at that! And Lumberjanes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Lumberjanes.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: And Lumberjanes. And other things soon to be revealed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
